blogs.title: Optimizing CRM for Better User Experience
blogs.body: At Avinto, we recently revamped our CRM system to improve efficiency and usability. The new design enhances navigation, integrates automation, and ensures a seamless user experience. Our goal was to reduce friction and improve engagement for both our internal team and clients.
blogs.author: Dhiraj

blogs.title: Developing a Role-Based Hiring System
blogs.body: Avinto introduced a unique hiring system where applicants can propose their own roles based on their expertise. This system allows us to attract talented individuals who might not fit into traditional job descriptions but bring great value to the company.
blogs.author: Animesh

blogs.title: Enhancing Security with a New Login System
blogs.body: Security is a top priority at Avinto. We recently implemented a multi-factor authentication (MFA) system, adding an extra layer of security to our login process. This helps protect user data and ensures compliance with security best practices.
blogs.author: Sajjan

blogs.title: Automated Reporting for Business Insights

blogs.title: Scaling Our SaaS Infrastructure
blogs.body: Avinto is expanding its SaaS solutions by improving server scalability and optimizing database performance. Our latest project focused on reducing downtime and improving system reliability to handle a growing user base efficiently.
blogs.author: Sajjan
